name: The chased boy
description:
Get the Cubes. Get Chased. Get out. Don't get caught.

"Ahh, TEC games, they were a pretty cool company in my childhood. I'm so happy, that I found this old beta of a never released game. Now I can share it here to bring you all a bit nostalgia... I haven't played it myself yet and I'm sure there will be some bugs, but it will be fun, for sure"
-DoubleDuck24

Don't worry, this whole creepypasta is not true. This game got made by us in just 1 week to give our fans something to play. Have fun!

Controls-

WASD: Move

Mouse: Turn

Shift: Run
